  • Publications

Visual Tracking via Exemplar Regression Model

Ma X, Liu Q, He Z, et al (Knowledge-Based Systems)

PDF CODE

Although few researchers have noticed this, by giving a very simple negative-positive constraint for the training samples set of a common kernelized regression model, a state-of-the-art robust visual tracker can be constructed.
